trans-unit.source: Represents a query that tests whether a message matches an EndpointAddress using a *Longest-Prefix Match* for the URI component.
An <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> object includes a URI and an optional collection of addressing headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> 对象包括一个 URI 和一个可选的寻址标头的集合。

trans-unit.source: The addressing and message headers are canonicalized to be compared for equality.
trans-unit.target: 已规范化寻址标题和消息标题以进行相等比较。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter appears more than once in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>, the corresponding header must appear in the message at least that many times.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> 中出现的次数多于一次，则相应的标头必须在消息中至少显示相同的次数。

trans-unit.source: This filter performs the same query as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter>, except that the test for whether a message matches an endpoint address is done by a *Longest-Prefix Match*.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器执行相同的查询<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter>，只不过测试消息是否与终结点地址相匹配通过*最长前缀匹配*。

trans-unit.source: This means that the URI specified in the filter does not have to match the message's URI exactly, but must be contained in that URI as a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 这表示筛选器中指定的 URI 不需要与消息的 URI 完全匹配，不过必须作为前缀包含在该 URI 中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a filter specifies the address "www.foo.com", and a message is addressed to "www.foo.com/customerA", then the URI part of the filter query condition will be met.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果筛选器指定地址“www.foo.com”，并且消息是发送给“www.foo.com/customerA”，则将满足筛选器查询条件的 URI 部分。

trans-unit.source: However, the header portion of the filter query still has to be done.
trans-unit.target: 不过，筛选器查询的标头部分仍需要完成。

trans-unit.source: Internet Information Services (IIS) and the underlying file system (NTFS or FAT) are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和基础文件系统（NTFS 或 FAT）不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: URI comparisons done by this class are also case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此类进行的 URI 比较也不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: So, for example, http://www.microsoft.com is evaluated as equal to http://WWW.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 因此，举例来说，http://www.microsoft.com计算为等于http://WWW.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> against which messages are tested.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class.
<paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> against which messages are tested.
<see langword="true" /> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> class.
If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果在本地计算机上安装了 Web 服务，则有多种等效方法引用该服务，其中包括：

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `includeHostNameInComparison` parameter is `false`, the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `includeHostNameInComparison` 参数的值为 `false`，则以上 URI 都解析为同一终结点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets the Endpoint Address that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> tests messages against.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> tests messages against.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> 用以测试消息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Data associated with the filters in the table.
trans-unit.target: 与表中的筛选器关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new filter table that tests a message against multiple endpoint addresses simultaneously.

An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable`1" /> interface that can contain <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" />s with associated <paramref name="FilterData" />.
The method returns an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> that is optimized to test for specific message endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 的一个实例，该实例经过了优化，可测试特定消息终结点。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison.
<see langword="true" /> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名称包含在终结点地址比较中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果在本地计算机上安装了 Web 服务，则有多种等效方法引用该服务，其中包括：

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc

trans-unit.source: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `false`, so the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint, unless you change this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 `false`，因此上面的 URI 都解析为同一终结点，除非您更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message or buffered message satisfies the criteria of the endpoint filter.
The two overloads of this method are equivalent because this filter does not examine the message body, only the address, to do a longest-prefix match, and then the headers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的两个重载是等效的，因为此筛选器不检查消息正文，只检查地址，执行最长前缀匹配，然后检查标头。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> object to test.
Tests whether a message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> object satisfies the endpoint address specified in the filter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The two overloads of this method are equivalent because this filter does not examine the message body, only the address, to do a longest-prefix match, and then the headers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的两个重载是等效的，因为此筛选器不检查消息正文，只检查地址，执行最长前缀匹配，然后检查标头。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> object to test.
Tests whether a buffered message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> object satisfies the endpoint address; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The two overloads of this method are equivalent because this filter does not examine the message body, only the address, to do a longest-prefix match, and then the headers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的两个重载是等效的，因为此筛选器不检查消息正文，只检查地址，执行最长前缀匹配，然后检查标头。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="messageBuffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
